message_1:
Suppose the number of visitors to a popular tourist destination was recorded for the past 12 months. The data is shown below:

10,000, 12,000, 11,500, 13,000, 15,000, 16,500, 20,000, 18,000, 19,500, 22,000, 24,500, 25,000

Find the following measures for this time series data:
a) Mean
b) Median
c) Mode
d) Range
e) Variance
f) Standard deviation
message_2:
a) Mean:
To find the mean, we add up all the values and divide by the number of values.

Mean = (10,000 + 12,000 + 11,500 + 13,000 + 15,000 + 16,500 + 20,000 + 18,000 + 19,500 + 22,000 + 24,500 + 25,000) / 12
Mean = 207,000 / 12
Mean = 17,250

b) Median:
To find the median, we first arrange the values in ascending order and then find the middle value.

10,000, 11,500, 12,000, 13,000, 15,000, 16,500, 18,000, 19,500, 20,000, 22,000, 24,500, 25,000

Since there are 12 values, the median will be the average of the 6th and 7th values.

Median = (16,500 + 18,000) / 2
Median = 34,500 / 2
Median = 17,250

c) Mode:
The mode is the value that appears most frequently in the dataset. In this case, there are no repeated values, so there is no mode.

d) Range:
The range is the difference between the highest and lowest values in the dataset.

Range = 25,000 - 10,000
Range = 15,000

e) Variance:
To find the variance, we first find the difference between each value and the mean, square these differences, and then find the average of these squared differences.

Differences from the mean: -7,250, -5,250, -5,750, -4,250, -2,250, -750, 2,750, 750, 2,250, 4,750, 7,250, 7,750
Squared differences: 52,562,500, 27,562,500, 33,062,500, 18,062,500, 5,062,500, 562,500, 7,562,500, 562,500, 5,062,500, 22,562,500, 52,562,500, 60,062,500

Sum of squared differences = 287,250,000
Variance = Sum of squared differences / (Number of values - 1)
Variance = 287,250,000 / 11
Variance = 26,113,636.36

f) Standard deviation:
The standard deviation is the square root of the variance.

Standard deviation = √26,113,636.36
Standard deviation ≈ 5,110.57

So, the measures for this time series data are:
a) Mean: 17,250
b) Median: 17,250
c) Mode: None
d) Range: 15,000
e) Variance: 26,113,636.36
f) Standard deviation: 5,110.57
